wikipedia_page.main: Harry Mellor (1895 – after 1926) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward. He made one league appearance in the Football League Third Division North for Nelson in the 1921–22 campaign.

response: *Harry Mellor (footballer, born 1878) (1878–1950), footballer with Crewe Alexandra, Stoke and Grimsby Town
*Harry Mellor (footballer, born 1895), played in the Football League for Nelson
